definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

pinyin: deng1 ji1 shou3 xu4 gui4 tai2

sentences.english: The land has been confiscated and all the formalities are ready for starting construction.
sentences.chinese: 该项目土地已征迁，各项手续齐备，可开工建设。

sentences.english: AF Flight No.123 is checking in at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 法航123号航班正在办理登机手续。

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 东欧各国都为简化商业手续至少采取了一项措施。

sentences.english: I am not a good painter but I like to daub.
sentences.chinese: 下一道手续是在墙面上涂抹一层沙浆。

sentences.english: After receiving the notice, we will provide you with relevant formalities.
sentences.chinese: 收到包裹单后，我们将为您办理相关手续。

sentences.english: Methods The ink print of fingerprint and palmar patterns were obtained with informed consent.
sentences.chinese: 方法在知情同意手续下，捺印调查对象的手纹。

sentences.english: You will be charged commissions and telegraphic fees.
sentences.chinese: 您要付手续费和电报费。

sentences.english: Wang Xueming keen on the idea, so she came to Beijing to complete the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 王学明满口答应，让她来北京办手续。

sentences.english: After be like formalities all ready, insurance company should be compensated for in end a case inside 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 若手续齐备后，保险公司应在10天内一次结案赔偿。

sentences.english: Obtaining a refund from company is a complicated procedure.
sentences.chinese: 象公司索散退款手续很复杂。

sentences.english: We shall have to go through customes at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在机场办理海关手续。

sentences.english: I request for statement by post. HK$20/month will be charged.
sentences.chinese: 本人要求邮寄月结单，每月手续费为$20。

sentences.english: Does the procedure take much time?
sentences.chinese: 这手续会花很多时间吗？

sentences.english: Departing guests are asked to check out by noon.
sentences.chinese: 离开旅馆的宾客须在中午前办理结账手续。

sentences.english: E. Proceed construction procedures, install equipment for civil engineering construction.
sentences.chinese: 办理施工手续，进行土建施工的设备安装。

sentences.english: To apply for a travel permit, what procedures shall be completed?
sentences.chinese: 申请旅行证须履行下列哪些手续？

definition: to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
to arrange/to settle/to complete/to carry through
